HomeHero.description.defaultMessage: The purpose of the Verida incentivized testnet is to stress-test network infrastructure and prepare storage node operations for mainnet. The program covers security, tooling, and UX testing across the Verida network and ecosystem of apps. Users will be rewarded VDA for participating in the testing process.
